item.title: Research
item.author: Author
item.description:
Interests My main research interests are in the field of formal methods for security and programming languages; with particular attention to program verification and semantics, code protection, malware detection, compilation, distributed systems and functional testing.
Projects (last update: November 16, 2021) Build Trust proof of Concept Funded by the University of Verona and Build Trust Srl (Joint Project 2021) Coordinator: Prof. Franco Fummi Research assistant
